downloadDescription: Microsoft Lync 2010 Awareness Materials are customizable resources that help you market your Microsoft Lync 2010 rollout.
detailsSection: This zipped file contains customizable awareness materials that will help you market your Microsoft Lync 2010 rollout and generate a higher adoption rate. Included are resources such as posters, table tents, stickers, and cubicle signs, that will help inform, involve, and inspire your users.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Office 2010; Microsoft Office 2007; Microsoft Office 2003
installInstructionSection: To install the download, save the zipped file to a directory on your computer. After you save it, unzip it by right-clicking the file name, selecting Extract All, selecting a destination where you want the extracted files to reside, and then clicking Extract. To remove the download, delete the file from the directory where you saved it.
